events.name: UnaDay: Everything you need to know about Sigfox technology!
events.description: Learn everything you need to know about Sigfox technology, the first dedicated IoT network in Singapore and commercial IoT solutions that can help you realise the true value and full potential of IoT. To mark the start to a great and exciting year for IoT in 2017, join UnaBiz at the inaugural edition of UnaDay!  For full details or to RSVP,Visit >> http://www.unabiz.com/events/events-singapore/
events.location: Capital Tower, STI Auditorium , Level 9, 168 Robinson Road, Singapore

events.name: TGIFHacks #63 - Making 3D-Printed Models
events.description:
TGIFHacks haven't touched any hardware topics for a long time, so let's have one.

Have you seen stuff printed by 3D printers? Do you ever want to use 3D printers to print something for your own projects? Come and learn how to create models for 3D printer in your browser and get it printed out with only a few dollars!
events.location: Theatre @ The Nest, Innovation Centre, 16 Nanyang Dr, S637722, , Singapore

events.name: Azure UG - IoT Hands On Series 1 - Feb 2017
events.description: Each group will be provided with Raspberry Pi 3 & a GroovePi+ Starter Kit for Raspberry Pi for getting hands on and build your solution.  Pre-Requisite for your Windows 10 Laptops  Please come prepared with a developer spec machine with the following setup 1. Laptop running Windows 10 Anniversary Update (14393) with admin rights. 2. Visual Studio 2015 Update 3 (Community Edition or above) 3. Universal Windows App Development Tools 1.4.1 and Windows 10 SDK [masked]) 4. IoT Core Project Template 5. Windows 10 IoT Core Dashboard 6. IoT Hub Device Explorer 7. Windows IoT Remote Client from the Windows 10 App Store Pre-Cache Windows IoT Core Nuget Packages Create and Build a test Windows IoT Core project. The purpose is to pre-cache the required NuGet packages on to your PC before the Hackathon as they are large downloads. GitHub Repository - https://github.com/mssgug/Azure-IoT-User-Group
events.location: Microsoft Operations Pte Ltd, 22CF12, Level 22, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore
